body_html: If it can help, maybe adding a private method in the team similar to disallow_multiple_student_roles and validating that upon creation of the team member / team update would help, that's all that comes to mind right now.
body_text: If it can help, maybe adding a private method in the team similar to disallow_multiple_student_roles and validating that upon creation of the team member / team update would help, that's all that comes to mind right now.
body: If it can help, maybe adding a private method in the team similar to `disallow_multiple_student_roles` and validating that upon creation of the team member / team update would help, that's all that comes to mind right now.
